overview: The emotional journeys of a widow and the man her husband loved. Kind, handsome and talented, Da Wei found success at a young age as an architect and built a happy marriage with Mei Xiu. In the eyes of outsiders, they are the perfect couple. After going through a near-death experience, Da Wei begins to fear that his life will end in a lie and finally chooses to confront his true self. He meets and falls in love with Guan Jie, and the two secretly carry on a relationship for a decade until his death. After Da Wei passes away, Mei Xiu finds that he left behind a wish list for her. The wish list leads her onto a meaningful trip around the city she calls home, and along the way, she encounters and befriends Guan Jie.
title: The Two of Us
